mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, added_date, member_id, game_no) VALUES ( cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{addedDate}, #{memberId},#{gameNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.member_id AS memberId, c.game_no AS gameNo, c.added_date AS addedDate, g.game_title AS gameTitle, g.game_price AS gamePrice FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN game g ON c.game_no = g.game_no WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}
